item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, feet, 2 misc
The Mairya Ahu, or Mairya Lord, is a black-winged Raptorian commander. The Ahus of old were Yazata generals, but now the Mairyas have taken the name to remind their enemies of their proud ancestry. The Mairyas prefer stealth and plunder and the Ahus rarely lead large armies.
